response.original_title: Captured and Bound By My CEO
response.overview: When Lydia West is kidnapped by her rival and forced to marry him for a year to save her dad, she's sure she'll hate him forever. But as the truth behind his actions emerges, Lydia is forced to question everything and everyone she thought she knew. Caught between loyalty to her family and her growing feelings for a man she's supposed to hate, Lydia must decide whether she can resist falling for her captor or let duty tear them apart.
response.title: Captured and Bound By My CEO
